entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.0°C

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then periods of snow or rain. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 March 2023
